QuestData.Title: Lucky Yakshoe
QuestData.Description: While you were gone, I saw a group of grummles coming down the Burlap Trail. It was led by my Brother Yakshoe.$b$bBut then the Knucklethumps attacked. They took my brother and his grummles north.$b$bPlease, $p! Save my brother. He always has bad fortune and no luck, but he is my brother. Look for him at the alter in front of Fort Silverback.
QuestData.RewardText: Good fortune for me to be saved by a luckydo like you.$b$bAnd Brother Rabbitsfoot always say I not have good fortune. Bah!
